alert.note: Alert for Bristol; Eastern Kent; Newport; Northwest Providence; Southeast Providence; Washington; Western Kent (Rhode Island) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued July 14 at 3:02PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT EDT TONIGHT... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...Portions of northern Connecticut, including the following area, Windham CT. Portions of Massachusetts, including the following areas, Northern Bristol MA, Northern Worcester MA, Southern Bristol MA, Southern Worcester MA and Western Norfolk MA. Portions of Rhode Island, including the following areas, Bristol RI, Eastern Kent RI, Newport RI, Northwest Providence RI, Southeast Providence RI, Washington RI and Western Kent RI. * WHEN...Until Midnight EDT tonight. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Creeks and streams may rise out of their banks. Flooding may occur in poor drainage and urban areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Very wet antecedent conditions and low one and three hour flash flood guidance combined with the potential for additional localized heavy rainfall from thunderstorms have heightened concerns about urban, poor drainage, and flash flooding. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.

area.areaDesc: Bristol; Eastern Kent; Newport; Northwest Providence; Southeast Providence; Washington; Western Kent
